text: Nimen yingdang zhidao: Jinshi shenghuo, zhishi youxi, yule, dianzhui, jinkua, yi caichan he zisun de fushu xiang zhengsheng; piru shiyu, shi tianmiao zizhang, nongfu jianle feichang gaoxing, sihou, tianmiao kugao, ni kan ta biancheng huangse de, ji'er lingluo. Zai houshi, you yanli de xingfa, yeyou cong zhenzhu fachu de she youhe xiyue; jinshi shenghuo, zhishi qipian ren de xiangshou.
